articles.title: Why the Lightning's three-peat quest will be so difficult - ESPN
articles.description: The last time an NHL team won three straight Cups was from 1981-83. We check in with players who fell one short of a three-peat to explain why.
articles.content:
After back-to-back Stanley Cup championships for the Tampa Bay Lightning, coach Jon Cooper couldn't believe he was uttering these words:
"We're going for three."

articles.description: After signing with the Chargers, Van Noy, the ninth-year NFL linebacker who once starred at BYU, is on his third team in as many seasons.
articles.content:
